text: وَلَقَدْ وَصَّلْنَا لَهُمُ ٱلْقَوْلَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And We have [repeatedly] conveyed to them the Qur'an that they might be reminded.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya telah Kami turunkan berturut-turut perkataan ini (Al Quran) kepada mereka agar mereka mendapat pelajaran.
